CustomField.formula:
IF( Email <> "",
HYPERLINK("https://asap2.convoq.com/meeting/sfmeetnow.aspx?lid=" & Id, IMAGE("https://asap2.convoq.com/Images/Presence/Init.gif?lid=" & Id, "Install ASAP to initiate online meetings.", 16, 15) & "Meet with " & FirstName & " " & LastName ),
IMAGE("https://asap2.convoq.com/Images/Presence/Init.gif?lid=" & Id, "No email address provided", 16, 15) & "No email address provided")
CustomField.label: Meet with User
